image as being a bunch of layers that I put into it I can specify
okay here's the base operating system I'm going to add in my code in in an app directory I'm going to say here's the
executable that I want to run and then when I want to call it I just go out and call that particular thing and so now

image or a map of what that file system would look like and then when I want to run it I just pull a machine that's

my executable and because of that it's very fast to spin up it's very
